definition: simple/uncomplicated/letter/to choose/to select/bamboo strips used for writing (old)
to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform/abbr. for 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]
Second Chinese Character Simplification Scheme (second round of simplified Chinese characters, proposed in 1977 and retracted in 1986)/abbr. to 二簡|二简[er4 jian3]
pinyin: Di4 er4 ci4 Han4 zi4 Jian3 hua4 Fang1 an4

sentences.english: After making some simplifying assumptions, this paper obtains the fatigue life of steel towers.
sentences.chinese: 在作了一些簡化假設後，得到了鋼塔架疲勞壽命。

sentences.english: Meanwhile, the swing model of fish tail fin is established and simplified.
sentences.chinese: 對魚的尾鰭擺動進行了力學建模，並加以簡化。

sentences.english: Every country in Eastern Europe took at least one step to make things easier for business.
sentences.chinese: 東歐各國都爲簡化商業手續至少採取了一項措施。

sentences.english: In addition the indirect method of determination of hyPothetic forces is also considered.
sentences.chinese: 文中也考慮了虛擬力的間接求解的簡化計算法。

sentences.english: In particular, my design employed mock objects to make testing easier.
sentences.chinese: 尤其是，我的設計利用了模仿對象來簡化測試。

sentences.english: I like to use this time, also, to simplify my life.
sentences.chinese: 我同時希望利用這次節日去簡化的我生活。

sentences.english: The storefront will aim to simplify the process, in order to attract publishers.
sentences.chinese: 這個商店將努力使得流程簡化以吸引出版商參與。

sentences.english: The adoption of this invention can simplify its technological process and renew the dockage-removing system.
sentences.chinese: 採用此項發明，工藝簡化，更新了除雜系統。

sentences.english: Besides, simplify the circuit, improve dependability of the stabilizer and interference-free ability .
sentences.chinese: 同時，簡化電路，提高減搖鰭的可靠性和抗干擾能力。

sentences.english: It also makes it much easier to do instruction scheduling for unrolled loops.
sentences.chinese: 它還簡化了對於展開循環進行的指令調度。

sentences.english: To facilitate this task, BIRT provides the Data Explorer View.
sentences.chinese: BIRT提供了數據瀏覽視圖以簡化該任務。

sentences.english: The irrevocable trend of the development of the Chinese characters is simplifying.
sentences.chinese: 簡化是漢字發展不可逆轉的走向。

sentences.english: The authors suggest a simplified method of significant test for the compatibility of curve fitting.
sentences.chinese: 本文提出一種曲線擬合適度顯著性檢驗的簡化法。

sentences.english: Mesh simplification is one of the most important methods for solving the above problems.
sentences.chinese: 網格模型簡化是解決上述問題的主要方法之一。

sentences.english: To simplify the algorithm implementation, I'll assume that walls are laid out at right angles.
sentences.chinese: 爲了簡化算法實現，假設牆的轉彎都是直角的。

sentences.english: Accordingly, the circuit configuration of fader device is simplified.
sentences.chinese: 由此簡化衰減器裝置的電路結構。

to correspond/answering (one another)/to agree (among the part)/corresponding/relevant/appropriate/(modify) accordingly

many and complicated/mired in minor details
